name: Hugo: Quest for the Sunstones
description: Hugo: Quest for the Sunstones (original title Hugo: Jagten På Solstenene, also known as Hugo 3D) is a 3D platform game developed and published by ITE Media in 2000 for the PlayStation and PC. The game takes place in the same setting as the "Jungle Island" program of Hugo show and its Hugo: Jungle Island video game adaptation series.
